title: Jean-Nicolas Beuze
subtitle:
What does “belonging” mean for:

• indigenous children with no access to potable water?

• older persons parked away in nursing homes?

• stateless persons with no State to fulfill their rights?

• refugees who long to go back home?

 and for you: what does it mean? pic.twitter.com/rMUboBCCJQ
